name: TajweedKit
summary: A Swift library for parsing and highlighting Quranic text with Tajweed rules.
description:
TajweedKit provides an easy way to parse Quranic text and apply Tajweed colors for proper pronunciation guidance.
It supports customizable colors, works with UIKit and SwiftUI, and handles various Tajweed rules like Mad, Ghunnah, Qalqalah, and Idgham.
